channel.title: Shokunin, a powerful, Rust-based Static Site Generator
channel.description: Shokunin is a cutting-edge Static Site Generator (SSG) created for speed and flexibility. Offering a secure, super flexible solution, it effortlessly generates professional websites and blogs within seconds.
